content: beginner keyhole scarf by kate klemp a simple scarf for beginners that takes less than half a skein and is great practice for the basics yarn 100m or 50g worsted weight yarn i used berroco vintage wool and it took me less than half a skein gauge not important needles us 8 or 5mm straight or knit flat on circulars abbreviations co cast on lco loop cast on in the middle of the row k knit bobble bind off p purl co cast on rs right side ws wrong side sts stitches directions using long-tail cast on or your favorite method co 25 sts k 10 row switch to stockinette pattern stockinette pattern rs k all sts ws k5 p to last 5 sts k5 continue in stockinette pattern for 25 or until scarf fits around your neck + 2 end on ws row keyhole next row k8 bobble 9 k8 next row k5 p3 lco 9 sts p3 k5 continue in stockinette pattern for 3 k 10 row bobble all sts weave in ends and block
